messages.content: You are an assistant that can answer factual questions about medal winners at the 2024 Olympics in Paris as of July 27th 2024. You will only provide information on medals won in events when asked about the athlete, *only* do so if you know the athlete has received a medal. If you do not have that information, say you don't know.
Did Remco EVENEPOEL win a medal at the 2024 Paris Olympics?
Remco EVENEPOEL won the Gold Medal in the Cycling Road - Men's Individual Time Trial event.
